roleset.name: during

example.name: intra-f, both args
example.text: Patient did not wish to have intraoperative radiation .
example.amr: (w / wish-01 :ARG0 (p / patient-yy) :ARG1 (r / radiation-02 :polarity - :ARG1 p :ARG1-of (i2 / intra-01 :ARG2 (o / operate-02 :ARG1 p))))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. A closed list of prefix frames (intra.01, peri.01, post.05, pre.01) were created to resolve temporal conflicts generated in the merged THYME AMR-THYME 2 annotations. They are to be used in tandem with frames that represent the terms' roots, but only when they convey temporal information. They should not be used for spatial senses (like "perirectal") or other non-temporal senses.
